// KP state dumped by "Spawn Units" gadget version 1.52
// KP script written by "Write GameState" widget version 1.52

[GAME]
{
	GameType=Rock, Paper, Scissors 0.65;
	Mapname=Data Cache L1;

	[MODOPTIONS]
	{
		MissionBriefing="You have one hand\nThe AI has four hands.\nCan you still beat it?";

		// KP specific:
		nowalls=1;// Because neither AI can't handle them
		nospecials=0;// Set to make it simpler
		ons=0;// Shielded gamemode, 0 for disabled, 2 for weak, 4 for ultra
		sos=0;// Amount per building, 0 for disabled
		colorwars=0;// Time in minutes before doom, 0 for disabled
		preplaced=0;// Give a pre-built base

		// Heroes of Mainframe options:
		homf=0;

		// Generic, but still applying to KP:
		GameMode=1;
			// 0 for "Kill everything!"
			// 1 for "Kill all factories!"
			// 2 for "Kill the Kernel!"
			// 3 for "Never ends!"
		ghostedbuildings=1;
		fixedallies=0;
		MaxUnits=512;
		MinSpeed=0.1;
		MaxSpeed=10;

		// Irrelevant for KP:
		StartMetal=1024;
		StartEnergy=1024;
		LauncherName=Write GameState widget;
		LauncherVersion=1.52;
		DateTime=Tuesday 17 August 2010 at 02:58:21;
	}

	HostIP=localhost;
	HostPort=0;
	IsHost=1;

	StartPosType=0;// 0 for fixed, 1 for random, 2 for chosen ingame, 3 for chosen out of game
	MyPlayerNum=0;
	MyPlayerName=Player;
	NumPlayers=1;
	NumUsers=2;
	NumTeams=2;
	NumAllyTeams=2;

	// List of human controlled players:
	[PLAYER0]
	{
		name=Player;
		Team=0;
		Spectator=0;
	}

	// List of AI controlled players:
	[AI1]
	{
		Name=Enemy;
		ShortName=Kernel Panic AI;
		//Version=?;
		Team=1;
		Host=0;// Number of the PLAYER hosting the AI
	}

	// List of "teams" (or "players" depending on terminology):
	[TEAM0]
	{
		TeamLeader=0;
		AllyTeam=0;
		Handicap=0;
		Side=system;
		RGBColor=0 0.3 1;
		StartPosX=3854;
		StartPosZ=1540;
		RemoveUnits=1;
		RemoveFeatures=1;
		u1= hand Position 3854 1540 Rotation 270 Repeat;
	}
	[TEAM1]
	{
		TeamLeader=0;
		AllyTeam=1;
		Handicap=0;
		Side=hacker;
		RGBColor=1 0.1 0.2;
		AIDLL=Kernel Panic AI;
		StartPosX=224;
		StartPosZ=1540;
		RemoveUnits=1;
		RemoveFeatures=1;
		u1= hand Position 214 2848 Rotation 90;
		u2= hand Position 922 2404 Rotation 90;
		//u3= hand Position 250 1540 Rotation 90;
		u4= hand Position 922 676 Rotation 90;
		u5= hand Position 218 228 Rotation 90;
	}

	// List of ally teams: This is for assymetrical alliances
	[ALLYTEAM0]
	{
		NumAllies=0;
	}
	[ALLYTEAM1]
	{
		NumAllies=0;
	}

	// List of restrictions
	NumRestrictions=0;
	[RESTRICT]
	{
	}
}
